title: King's poignant first state visit reaffirming Anglo-German relations
description: The King was still mid-flight when the military welcome began.

title: Pope to spend 'few days' in hospital for respiratory infection
description: Pope Francis will need to spend "a few days" in hospital for treatment for a respiratory infection, the Vatican says.

title: Trans community fears backlash after Nashville school shooting
description: The trans community is fearing a “backlash” following the school shooting in Nashville.

title: Elon Musk and experts say AI development should be paused immediately
description: Elon Musk and a group of artificial intelligence experts are calling for a pause in the training of powerful AI systems due to the potential risks to society and humanity.

title: Killer plant fungus infects man in 'world-first case'
description: A killer plant fungus infected a human and caused flu-like symptoms in what researchers say is a world-first case.

title: King addresses state banquet after German president hails Charles's 'convictions'
description: The King has addressed a banquet in Berlin on his first state visit since the start of the new monarch's reign.

title: More than 220,000 Russian troops and mercenaries killed or injured in Ukraine, UK defence sec says
description: More than 220,000 Russian troops and mercenaries have been killed or injured in Ukraine, according to the latest US assessment, Britain's defence secretary has revealed.

title: Next wave of weight loss jabs could be coming - this time without the nausea
description: Weight loss jabs such as Ozempic and Wegovy have been hailed as the future of obesity treatment - but some users are debilitated by nausea and regain the lost pounds as soon as they stop injections.

title: US and South Korea staging biggest military drills for years as North ramps up tensions
description: On the southeast coast of South Korea its military is rehearsing.

title: Sabrina star Melissa Joan Hart helped children fleeing Nashville school shooting
description: Actor Melissa Joan Hart helped children running away from the shooter who killed six people at a Nashville school.

title: Biden and Netanyahu in icy exchange over Israel's controversial judicial reforms
description: US President Joe Biden has openly criticised Israel's controversial judicial reforms and told Prime Minister Benjamin Netanyahu to "walk away" from them.

title: Footage shows guards appearing to make no effort to help 38 migrants who died in Mexico detention centre fire
description: Guards at a Mexico detention centre appeared to make no effort to help 38 migrants who died in a fire, surveillance footage shows.

title: Star Wars star Mark Hamill helping warn Ukrainians of Russian air strikes
description: Star Wars star Mark Hamill is lending his voice to an air raid alert app to warn Ukrainians of incoming Russian bombardments.

title: Adnan Syed's murder conviction reinstated in Serial podcast case
description: Adnan Syed's murder conviction has been reinstated in the latest development in the prolonged case featured in the hit podcast Serial.
